Package propra22.q8493367.draw.controller

Interface IDrawPanelController

All Known Implementing Classes:
DrawPanelController
public interface IDrawPanelController
The interface for the draw panel controller.

  • Method Details

    • pointSetIsEmpty

      boolean pointSetIsEmpty()
      Returns true, if the point set does not contain a point. Returns false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true, if the point set does not contain a point, false otherwise.

    • createNewDrawPanel

      void createNewDrawPanel()
      Creates a new empty draw panel.

    • undoCommand

      void undoCommand()
      Undoes a command.

    • redoCommand

      void redoCommand()
      Redoes a command.

    • undoIsEnabled

      boolean undoIsEnabled()
      Returns true, if the undo functionality is enabled. Returns false otherwise.
      Returns:
      True, if the undo functionality is enabled, false otherwise.

    • redoIsEnabled

      boolean redoIsEnabled()
      Returns true, if the redo functionality is enabled. Returns false otherwise.
      Returns:
      True, if the redo functionality is enabled, false otherwise.

    • updateModel

      void updateModel()
      Updates the model of the draw panel. This means, the point set, the convex hull, the diamter, the quadrangle and the quadrangle sequence are updated. Afterwards, all observers are notified.

    • updateView

      void updateView()
      Updates the draw panel.

    • clearModel

      void clearModel()
      Removes all points from the point set. As a consequence all points are removed from the hull.

    • insertPointToPointSetByUserInput

      void insertPointToPointSetByUserInput(int x, int y)
      Inserts a point into the point set as result of an action by the user. Afterwards, the model is updated.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the point.
      y - the y coordinate of the point.

    • insertPointToPointSetByFileInput

      void insertPointToPointSetByFileInput(int x, int y)
      Inserts point to point set from file input. Model is not updated afterwards.
      Parameters:
      x - the x coordinate of the point
      y - the y coordinate of the point

    • deletePointFromPointSetByUserInput

      void deletePointFromPointSetByUserInput(int mouseX, int mouseY, double totalScale)
      Deletes a point from the point set as result of an action by the user. Afterwards, the model is updated.
      Parameters:
      mouseX - the x coordinate of the mouse.
      mouseY - the y coordinate of the mouse.
      totalScale - the total scale

    • initializePointDrag

      void initializePointDrag(int mouseX, int mouseY, double totalScale)
      Initializes a point drag.
      Parameters:
      mouseX - the x coordinate of the mouse which is the starting x coordinate of the drag
      mouseY - the y coordinate of the mouse which is the starting y coordinate of the drag
      totalScale - scale * panelScale. This value is needed to calculate the distance in the model.

    • dragPoint

      void dragPoint(int mouseX, int mouseY)
      Drags a point after the point drag has been initialized.
      Parameters:
      mouseX - the x coordinate of the mouse
      mouseY - the y coordinate of the mouse

    • terminatePointDrag

      void terminatePointDrag(int mouseX, int mouseY)
      Terminates a point drag. Called, when the user releases the mouse or the alt button.
      Parameters:
      mouseX - the x coordinate of the mouse
      mouseY - the y coordinate of the mouse

    • getConvexHullIsshown

      boolean getConvexHullIsshown()
      Returns true, if the convex hull is shown, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true, if the convex hull is shown. False otherwise.

    • getDiameterIsShown

      boolean getDiameterIsShown()
      Returns true if the diameter is shown on the draw panel. Returns false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true if the diameter is shown, otherwise returns false.

    • getQuadrangleIsShown

      boolean getQuadrangleIsShown()
      Returns true if the quadrangle is shown on the draw panel. Returns false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true if the quadrangle is shown, false otherwise.

    • getAnimationIsShown

      boolean getAnimationIsShown()
      Returns true, if the animation is shown on the draw panel. Returns false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true if the animation is shown, false otherwise.

    • getTriangleIsShown

      boolean getTriangleIsShown()
      Returns true, if the triangle is shown on the draw panel, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true, if the triangle is shown, false otherwise.

    • setShowConvexHull

      void setShowConvexHull(boolean b)
      Determines, if the convex hull is be shown.
      Parameters:
      b - true, whether the convex hull is to be shown. False otherwise.

    • setShowDiameter

      void setShowDiameter(boolean b)
      Determines whether the diameter is to be shown.
      Parameters:
      b - true, if the diameter is be shown. False otherwise.

    • setShowQuadrangle

      void setShowQuadrangle(boolean b)
      Determines whether the quadrangle is to be shown.
      Parameters:
      b - true, if the quadrangle is be shown. False otherwise.

    • setShowTriangle

      void setShowTriangle(boolean b)
      Determines whether the triangle is to be shown.
      Parameters:
      b - true, if the triangle is be shown. False otherwise.

    • setShowAnimation

      void setShowAnimation(boolean animationIsShown)
      Determines whether the animation is to be shown.
      Parameters:
      animationIsShown - true if the animation is to be shown.False otherwise

    • insertRandomPoints

      void insertRandomPoints(int number, int minX, int minY, int maxX, int maxY)
      Insert a certain number of randomly generated points into the point set.
      Parameters:
      number - the number of random points to be inserted into the point set.
      minX - the minimum x coordinate which the points are allowed to have
      minY - the minimum y coordinate which the points are allowed to have
      maxX - the maximum x coordinate which the points are allowed to have
      maxY - the maximum y coordinate which the points are allowed to have

    • addObserver

      void addObserver(IDrawPanelControllerObserver observer)
      Adds an observer.
      Parameters:
      observer - the observer which is added

    • removeObserver

      void removeObserver(IDrawPanelControllerObserver observer)
      Removes an observer.
      Parameters:
      observer - the observer which is removed

    • notifyObservers

      void notifyObservers()
      Notifies all observers.

    • reset

      void reset()
      Resets the draw panel controller. This method is used, if a new point set is loaded from a file or if a new draw panel is created.

    • updateMouseData

      void updateMouseData(int mouseX, int mouseY, double totalScale)
      Updates the mouse data.
      Parameters:
      mouseX - the x coordinate of the mouse.
      mouseY - the y coordinate of the mouse.
      totalScale - the product of scale and panelScale. This value is needed to calculate distances in the model. In this application we need it to determine the selected point.

    • setMousePositionIsOverPanel

      void setMousePositionIsOverPanel(boolean b)
      Sets the state of the mouse. b is true if the mouse pointer is located over the draw panel. b is false, if the mouse pointer is not located over the draw panel.
      Parameters:
      b - true, if the mouse is located over the draw panel. False otherwise.

    • getDiameter

      IDiameter getDiameter()
      Gets the diameter of the point set.
      Returns:
      the diameter

    • getDiameterLength

      double getDiameterLength()
      Gets the length of the diameter of the point set.
      Returns:
      the diameter length

    • getBiggestQuadrangle

      IQuadrangle getBiggestQuadrangle()
      Gets the biggest quadrangle of the point set
      Returns:
      the biggest quadrangle

    • hullAsArray

      int[][] hullAsArray()
      Returns the hull as an array.
      Returns:
      the n x 2 int array which contains the coordinate of all points of the hull moving clockwise along the hull. We refer to a standard cartesian coordinate system.

    • centerView

      void centerView()
      Centers the representation on the view.
